TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit PropertyCollection extends System.Collections.Hashtable

Docs.summary: Represents a collection of properties that can be added to , , or .

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Data.PropertyCollection> can be accessed through the `ExtendedProperties` property of the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>, <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, or <xref:System.Data.DataTable> class.
Add custom properties to the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>, <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, or <xref:System.Data.DataTable> objects through the <xref:System.Data.PropertyCollection>. For example, you may want to store the time of the object's creation for later comparison to another object.
## Examples The following example creates a timestamp value for a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> and adds it to the <xref:System.Data.PropertyCollection>.
[!code-csharp[Classic WebData PropertyCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData PropertyCollection Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData PropertyCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData PropertyCollection Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
